tool_description: Monitors service level agreement compliance and alerts when performance targets are at risk or violated.

sla_targets.description: SLA targets to monitor (e.g., '80% calls answered in 20 seconds')

monitoring_period.description: Monitoring timeframe: real_time, hourly, daily, weekly

queue_scope.description: Queue IDs to include in monitoring

error_messages: Invalid SLA format: SLA targets must follow the format 'percentage calls metric threshold'.
Unknown monitoring period: Must be one of [real_time, hourly, daily, weekly].
Alert threshold out of range: Must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Queue not found: One or more specified queues do not exist.
Insufficient permissions: Cannot access SLA monitoring for specified scope.
usage: Define sla_targets array with specific performance goals and set monitoring_period. Optionally scope to specific queues and set alert_threshold for proactive notifications.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, at_risk, violation

current_performance.description: Current performance values for each SLA target

time_to_violation.description: Estimated minutes until potential SLA violation
